description:
## Hands-on
### Task
Given the two TripleMap in the mapping below, link the **<#TriplesMap1>** to **<#TriplesMap2>** so it has the object property ***foaf:based_near*** relating people and cities.
### CSV file content
| ID | Name | Phone | City |
|--|--|--|--|
| 1 | "Lily Dickens" | 585-610-2352 | Oneonta |
| 2 | "Chadd Sporer" | +1-352-334-0992 | Iowa |
| 3 | "Katharina Kuvalis" | (272) 642-0684 | Alberta |
| 4 | "Wilhelmine Johns III" | 574.747.4829 | Bock |
| 5 | "Sofia Rowe" | +15204328362 | Elmhurst |
### JSON file content
    [
	    {
		    "name": "Oneonta",
		    "surface": "90.16",
		    "population": "1812",
		    "latitude": "44.9625428",
		    "longitude": "-74.4168577"
		},
		{
		    "name": "Iowa",
		    "surface": "167.2",
		    "population": "133611",
		    "latitude": "29.6862705",
		    "longitude": "-82.319746"
		}, 
		...
	]
expected_result:
<http://sample.com/resource/Alberta> a <http://schema.org/Place>;
